title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4701.6 - Sources of funds available for payment of interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4701.6 - Sources of funds available for payment of interest

State Regulations

The authority holds or has control of moneys which represent
the proceeds of the issuance of its obligations or are on deposit in operating
funds of the authority derived primarily from its fees and charges, from which
it may pay interest on invoices with respect to which prompt payment is not
made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4701.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
